components.name: Screengrab
components.description: A component responsible for capturing screenshots of mobile applications using various strategies.

components.name: ScreenshotStrategy
components.description: An interface that defines the method for taking screenshots, allowing for different implementations like DecorViewScreenshotStrategy and UiAutomatorScreenshotStrategy.

components.name: FileWritingScreenshotCallback
components.description: Handles the saving of captured screenshots to the file system, managing file paths and directories.

components.name: CleanStatusBar
components.description: A utility component that modifies the status bar appearance during screenshot capture to ensure a clean output.

data_flows.description: Screengrab invokes the ScreenshotStrategy to capture screenshots using the selected strategy.
The screenshot captured by the ScreenshotStrategy is passed to FileWritingScreenshotCallback for saving.
Screengrab utilizes CleanStatusBar to ensure the status bar is clean before taking a screenshot.

trust_boundaries.name: User Device Trust Boundary
trust_boundaries.description: The boundary between the user's device and the fastlane service components.
